item.title: Gaze – The Missing Input Device for Magical VR Experiences
item.description: So you want to shoot lasers from your eyes, hmm?

item.title: Django 4 form rendering using Tailwind without Node or crispy
item.description: Since Django 4, form rendering with Tailwind can be used to render beautiful forms without using Node or any other packages like django-crispy-forms. All you need is the Tailwind CLI binary and django-widget-tweaks.
item.author: (Josef Erben)
